resources.string: Bulls and Cows is a 2 player game. One player thinks of a number, while the other player tries to guess it. The number to be guessed must be a 4 digit number, using only digits from 1 - 9, each digit atmost once. For every guess that the player makes, he gets 2 values - the number of bulls and the number of cows. 1 bull means the guess contains and the target number have 1 digit in common, and in the correct position. 1 cow means the guess and the target have 1 digit in common, but not in correct position. You should correctly guess the entire number.
